entry.title: How Blockchain Bridges Became Hackers’ Prime Targets
entry.summary: Nearly a billion dollars in crypto assets have been stolen from blockchain bridges in 2022.

entry.title: Traders Move ETH out of Centralized Exchanges and into DeFi
entry.summary: Ether balances on exchanges drop to lowest level since August 2018 while ETH locked in DeFi continues to rise.

entry.title: Wikipedia Community Pushes Back Against Crypto Donations
entry.summary: 71% of Wikipedia voters ask the Wikimedia Foundation to stop accepting cryptocurrency donations.

entry.title: Ethereum’s Merge Delayed Despite Successful ‘Shadow Fork’ Test
entry.summary: The most recent test processed mainnet transactions on a “shadow fork” – a subset of proof-of-work nodes that had been merged with the Beacon Chain to process proof-of-stake transactions.

entry.title: Major US Clearing House Experiments with CBDC for Real-Time Settlements
entry.summary: DTCC to explore whether a Federal Reserve-issued digital currency could clear a trade as soon as a brokerage sends the money.
